00001 #ifndef __TEXTURE_H__
00002 #define __TEXTURE_H__

00004 #include "tfile.h"

00006 class Texture
00007 {
00008 public:
00009         Texture(){glGenTextures(1,&ID);loaded = false;mipmaps = false;};
00010         ~Texture(){if(loaded)glDeleteTextures(1, &ID);};        
00011         int load(const char* filename);
00012         bool isLoaded(){return loaded;};
00013         bool applyToModel(GLuint textureUnit);
00014         void toggleMipmaps();
00015         void setMipmaps(bool enable);
00016         void genMipmaps(){/*maybe later*/};
00017 protected:
00018         bool loaded;
00019         bool mipmaps;
00020         GLuint ID;
00021 };
00022 
00023 int Texture::load(const char* filename)
00024 {
00025         //init the tga class
00026         tfile myTga;
00027         //load tga
00028         int tempReturn = myTga.load(filename);
00029         //if we successfully loaded the file
00030         if(tempReturn == TFILE_OPEN)
00031         {
00032                 if(!(glIsEnabled(GL_TEXTURE_2D)))
00033                 {
00034                         glEnable(GL_TEXTURE_2D);
00035                         std::cout<<"enabling textures"<<std::endl;
00036                 }
00037                 //bind to this texture ID
00038                 glBindTexture(GL_TEXTURE_2D, ID);
00039                 //load our texture into video memory
00040                 glTexImage2D(GL_TEXTURE_2D,0,myTga.getFormat(),myTga.getWidth(),myTga.getHeight(),0,myTga.getFormat(),GL_UNSIGNED_BYTE,myTga.getData());
00041                 //set the texture parameters
00042                 glTexParameterf(GL_TEXTURE_2D, GL_TEXTURE_MAG_FILTER, GL_LINEAR);       
00043                 if(mipmaps)
00044                 {
00045                         glTexParameterf(GL_TEXTURE_2D, GL_TEXTURE_MIN_FILTER, GL_LINEAR_MIPMAP_NEAREST);
00046                         glTexParameterf(GL_TEXTURE_2D, GL_GENERATE_MIPMAP, GL_TRUE);    
00047                 }
00048                 else
00049                 {
00050                         glTexParameterf(GL_TEXTURE_2D, GL_GENERATE_MIPMAP, GL_FALSE);   
00051                         glTexParameterf(GL_TEXTURE_2D, GL_TEXTURE_MIN_FILTER, GL_LINEAR);
00052                 }
00053                 loaded = true;
00054         }
00055         return tempReturn;
00056 }
00057 
00058 bool Texture::applyToModel(GLuint textureUnit = 0)
00059 {
00060         if(loaded)
00061         {
00062                 glActiveTexture(GL_TEXTURE0+textureUnit);
00063                 glBindTexture(GL_TEXTURE_2D, ID);
00064         }
00065         return loaded;
00066 }
00067 
00068 void Texture::setMipmaps(bool enable)
00069 {
00070         if(enable == mipmaps)
00071                 return;
00072         mipmaps = enable;
00073         glBindTexture(GL_TEXTURE_2D, ID);
00074         if(mipmaps)
00075                 {
00076                         glTexParameterf(GL_TEXTURE_2D, GL_TEXTURE_MIN_FILTER, GL_LINEAR_MIPMAP_NEAREST);
00077                         glTexParameterf(GL_TEXTURE_2D, GL_GENERATE_MIPMAP, GL_TRUE);
00078                 }
00079                 else
00080                 {
00081                         glTexParameterf(GL_TEXTURE_2D, GL_GENERATE_MIPMAP, GL_FALSE);   
00082                         glTexParameterf(GL_TEXTURE_2D, GL_TEXTURE_MIN_FILTER, GL_LINEAR);
00083                 }
00084 }
00085 
00086 void Texture::toggleMipmaps()
00087 {
00088         mipmaps = !mipmaps;
00089         glBindTexture(GL_TEXTURE_2D, ID);
00090         if(mipmaps)
00091                 {
00092                         glTexParameterf(GL_TEXTURE_2D, GL_TEXTURE_MIN_FILTER, GL_LINEAR_MIPMAP_NEAREST);
00093                         glTexParameterf(GL_TEXTURE_2D, GL_GENERATE_MIPMAP, GL_TRUE);
00094                 }
00095                 else
00096                 {
00097                         glTexParameterf(GL_TEXTURE_2D, GL_GENERATE_MIPMAP, GL_FALSE);   
00098                         glTexParameterf(GL_TEXTURE_2D, GL_TEXTURE_MIN_FILTER, GL_LINEAR);
00099                 }
00100 }
